long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ProBono Alert is the new plugin for your browser that automatically tells you when projects that matter to you and your impact-startup, charity, social enterprise or NGO are available.

Developed in partnership with leading businesses and charities - ProBono Alert exists to make it quick and easy to get the support you need. It is 100% free. It always will be.
